analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SX.play (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#331-380):
	External calls:
	- updateState() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#350)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- games (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#358-365)

Reentrancy in SX.play (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#331-380):
	External calls:
	- updateState() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#350)
	- (begin,end) = nextJackpot.addRange(msg.sender,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#365-369)
	External calls sending eth:
	- updateState() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#350)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalWeisInGame (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#375-379)

Reentrancy in SX.updateState (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#310-327):
	External calls:
	- nextJackpot.shouldSelectWinner() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#314-327)
	- nextJackpot.selectWinner() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#316-317)
	- JackpotWinnerSelected(prevJackpots.length,nextJackpot.winnerOffset()) (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#318-323)
	External calls sending eth:
	- finishAllGames() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#314)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nextJackpot (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#324-327)
	- prevJackpots (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#323-324)

SX.finishJackpot (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#425-450) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- address(jackpot).balance == 0

SX.updateState (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#310-327) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-nextJackpot.selectWinner() (/unique_chucks/25/0xd1ce888d8a16bf464cc6f332ec2e8914a7f6dce2.sol#316-317)
